description:
A while back, I received the following e-mail:
"Hi my name is Brant. I'm 26 and I have a boyfriend. We love your site and have members for years. I was curious about maybe doing a video."
He attached some pictures of himself — pale and muscular, with dark chest hair and a cute face.
I gave him a call. He was very soft spoken on the phone.
"So you and your boyfriend are interested in doing a video?" I said.
"No, just me," he replied. "He's too shy."
So, I started to explain how much the videos paid and such when Brant interrupted me.
"I'm not really interested in the money," he said.
"Oh," I said. "So what is it that interests you?"
"I don't know," he said. "I guess I like to be seen."
OK, I absolutely love it when guys tell me that. I love exhibitionists!
So we finally meet. He's a gymnast and he was doing flips and stuff all over our studio.
"Impressive!" I said.
"I've been doing gymnastics since I was eight," he told me.
Now he's teaching gymnastics for a living.
Is he a top or bottom? I forgot to ask. I guess we'll find out soon enough!
title: Brant
